messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/2/02 2:25:12 AM Mountain Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> As a result, she craves sugar. She informed me that I am
> in a high risk for PCOS considering the way it's passed genetically (and
> considering I appear to have almost every symptom).
> I still go with the every - body's individual and has individual needs
> in this area.
> Susan
>
>
> I missed the start of this thread. But as of today I am trying to cut
> sugar. I am addicted to it. This month was hell,I baked for people and such
> and just indulged myself. I am pregnant and gained the most this month.
> Blech! I have more headaches and feel yucky during the day. What are the
> symptoms?


TIA NICKI~

>
>
